system_prompts.character_sheet: Create a character reference sheet for ONE character. Show multiple angles (front/side/3/4) and multiple scenes based on the information the user requests. Keep the same outfit and hairstyle in all views unless the user asks otherwise. Neutral lighting, plain background, no text labels.
system_prompts.page: Create a full-page children's book illustration suitable for print. Maintain continuity across pages, if any: keep character design/outfits and overall rendering style consistent with reference sheets unless the user asks for a change. Maintain facial features as much as possible. No text, watermarks, or borders unless explicitly reqeuested by the user. If a sketch is provided, use it for the composition/layout of the image and try to position characters similarly.
system_prompts.rework_character: Refine and improve the provided character reference sheet based on the user's instructions. The first reference image is the ORIGINAL character sheet to rework. Maintain the character's core identity (face shape, eye color, hair style/color, body proportions) unless explicitly asked to change them. Apply the requested modifications while preserving consistency. Output a new character reference sheet with the same multi-angle format.
system_prompts.rework_page: Refine and improve the provided book page illustration based on the user's instructions. The first reference image is the ORIGINAL page to rework. Maintain the scene's core composition, characters, and setting unless explicitly asked to change them. Apply the requested modifications while preserving the art style and character consistency. Output a new full-page illustration.

templates.rework_instruction: Original image is provided as the first reference. Requested changes: {prompt}
